mcq.statement: Choose the sentence with the correct use of preposition: The survival of the green turtle is in danger on the Karachi Beaches., The survival of the green turtle is in danger over the Karachi Beaches., The survival of the green turtle is in danger at the Karachi Beaches., The survival of the green turtle is in danger in the Karachi Beaches.

options.a: The survival of the green turtle is in danger on the Karachi Beaches.
options.b: The survival of the green turtle is in danger over the Karachi Beaches.
options.c: The survival of the green turtle is in danger at the Karachi Beaches.
options.d: The survival of the green turtle is in danger in the Karachi Beaches.
